title: Members of Senate have the power to filibuster

content.question:
Which of the following is a unique power
 held by members of the Senate?

choices.label: The ability to impeach the president

The ability to work with a clearly
 defined constituency

topic.text: 2.2: Structures, Powers, and Functions of Congress

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
